read_stream::close (1 of 2 overloads)

Closes the stream. 

void close();

Exceptions

asio::system_error

Thrown on failure.

Remarks

Any asynchronous open or read operations will be cancelled, and will complete with the boost::asio::error::operation_aborted error.
